data.title: Kris Aquino signs last 'financial settlement' with ex-husband James Yap
data.meta_description: A WEEK before her 42nd birthday, Queen of All Media Kris Aquino is feeling blue. On her official Twitter account, Kris revealed that she had signed another chec
data.text:
A WEEK before her 42nd birthday, Queen of All Media Kris Aquino is feeling blue.

On her official Twitter account, Kris revealed that she had signed another check as last payment for her financial settlement with ex-husband James Yap.

"Siguro birthday blues talaga - last night while taking care of Bimb I had to sign another check in the millions, last payment sa financial settlement w/ u know who...," she tweeted.

Kris further tweeted: "I cried because of my past stupidity & sa exhaustion I feel sa trabaho na unfortunately hindi naman kay Josh & Bimb napunta ang pinagpapaguran ko."

The television host added that she felt like cold water was poured all over her and she realized that maybe she shouldn't hope to find that "happily ever after."

Kris said she brought the matter to Twitter to "get the pain off my chest."

To recall, the tv host/actress recently reacted on negative tweets she received on the micro blogging site allegedly from supporters of James.

At one point, Kris tweeted that she already "paid" for her peace and defended herself from haters attacking her and branding her as a "bad mother" to her sons. (Sunnex)
